member.name: T:Microsoft.Xrm.Client.CrmConnection
member.summary: Provides a connection (CrmService and MetadataService) to the server using a connection string.
member.remarks: The connection string needs to be in the form: "Authentication Type=AD; Server=http://crmDomain:port/organizationName; User ID=userDomain\userName; Password=userPassword" - The Authentication Type can be: Integrated, AD, SPLA, or Passport. - The Server address can be http or https and the port is optional. - The userDomain is optional. - If Authentication Type is Integrated, User ID and Password are not necessary.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Xrm.Client.CrmConnection.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Parses a connection string and creates a with the URL, organization, and credentials.
member.param: The connection string name specified in the web.config that contains the connection information for the Microsoft Dynamics CRM server in the form "Authentication Type=AD; Server=http://crmDomain:port/organizationName; User ID=userDomain\userName; Password=userPassword". The userDomain is optional.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Xrm.Client.CrmConnection.#ctor(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Parses a connection string and creates a with authentication.
member.param: If not null, the connection string will be pulled using the connection string name.
The connection string to use if there is no connection string name. It will be over-written if there is a connection string name provided.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Xrm.Client.CrmConnection.CreateMetadataService
member.summary: Gets a .

member.name: M:Microsoft.Xrm.Client.CrmConnection.CreateCrmService
member.summary: Gets a .

member.name: M:Microsoft.Xrm.Client.CrmConnection.Parse(System.String)
member.summary: Creates a new instance from a connection string.
member.param: In the form "Authentication Type=AD; Server=http://crmDomain:port/organizationName; User ID=userDomain\userName; Password=userPassword". The userDomain is optional.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Xrm.Client.CrmConnection.AuthenticationToken
member.summary: Gets the authentication token parsed from the connection string.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Xrm.Client.CrmConnection.ConnectionString
member.summary: Gets or sets the connection string.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Xrm.Client.CrmConnection.ConnectionStringName
member.summary: Gets or sets the connection string name.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Xrm.Client.CrmConnection.Credentials
member.summary: Gets the credentials parsed from the connection string.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Xrm.Client.CrmConnection.DiscoveryUri
member.summary: Gets the discovery service endpont, parsed from the connection string, for Online organizations to retrieve a CRM ticket.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Xrm.Client.CrmConnection.EnableCompression
member.summary: Gets the Http compression status parsed from the connection string. The default is true.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Xrm.Client.CrmConnection.ImpersonatedUser
member.summary: Gets or sets a Microsoft Dynamics CRM user for the CrmService and MetadataService to impersonate.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Xrm.Client.CrmConnection.PreAuthenticate
member.summary: Gets the value parsed from the connection string that indicates whether pre-authentication is enabled. The default is true.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Xrm.Client.CrmConnection.Timeout
member.summary: Indicates the time an XML Web service client waits for a synchronous XML Web service request to complete (in milliseconds). The default is 100000 milliseconds.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Xrm.Client.CrmConnection.Uri
member.summary: Gets the URI of the server parsed from the connection string.

member.name: P:Microsoft.Xrm.Client.CrmConnection.UseConnectionSharing
member.summary: Gets the value parsed from the connection string that indicates whether connection sharing is enabled when the client uses NTLM authentication to connect to the Web server that hosts the XML Web service. The default is false.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Xrm.Client.Plugins.Configuration
member.summary: Provides access for configuration XML.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Xrm.Client.Plugins.Configuration.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Parses configuration XML and creates a NameValueCollection for convenient retrieval of nodes' InnerXml.
member.param:
Must be in the form:
<configuration> <node1>value1</node1> <node2>value2</node2> </configuration>

member.name: P:Microsoft.Xrm.Client.Plugins.Configuration.Item(System.String)
member.summary: Gets the InnerXml of a node from the configuration XML.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Xrm.Client.Plugins.InvalidateCache
member.summary:
A simple callout plug-in class which invalidates cache based on create, delete, and update of Microsoft Dynamics CRM 4.0 entities. The plug-in must be registered to execute after (post-event) an entity is created, updated, or deleted. It must also be registered with a secure configuration in the following format:
<configuration> <invalidateCacheUrl>http://webAddress/CacheInvalidationHandlerPath.axd</invalidateCacheUrl> </configuration>

member.summary: Class for working with LiveId tickets.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Xrm.Client.Security.LiveIdTicketManager.Issue(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Guid,System.String)
member.summary: Gets a LiveId RequestSecurityTokenResponse ticket for a specified user. The ticket is returned as a string.
member.param: The LiveId for the user
The LiveId password for the user
sitename, i.e. crmapp.www.local-titan.com
auth policy, i.e. MBI_SSL
The unique id of the client/application
The device token xml
member.returns: A string that contains the LiveId ticket for the supplied paramters

member.name: M:Microsoft.Xrm.Client.Security.LiveIdTicketManager.Issue(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Guid,System.String,System.Xml.XmlNode@)
member.summary: Gets a LiveId RequestSecurityTokenResponse ticket for a specified user. The ticket itself is returned as a string, and the actual RSTR is returned as an XmlNode.
member.param: The LiveId for the user
The LiveId password for the user
sitename, i.e. crmapp.www.local-titan.com
auth policy, i.e. MBI_SSL
The unique id of the client/application
The device token xml
The RSTR from Live Id
member.returns: A string that contains the LiveId ticket for the supplied paramters

member.name: M:Microsoft.Xrm.Client.Security.LiveIdTicketManager.RegisterMachine(System.String,System.String,System.Guid)
member.summary: Registers a machine with the device registration LiveId service. The is used for registration. The result of this request will contain the PUID of the device registered and should be saved for later use.
member.param: The name of the device
The password to use for this registration
The unique id of the client/application

member.name: M:Microsoft.Xrm.Client.Security.LiveIdTicketManager.IssueDeviceToken(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Get a device authorization token from the LiveId service.
member.param: The name of the device
The password that was used to register this machine
member.returns: The device token to use when retrieving a user token

member.name: M:Microsoft.Xrm.Client.Security.LiveIdTicketManager.TryIssueDeviceToken(System.String,System.String,System.String@)
member.summary: Try to get a device authorization token from the LiveId service.
member.param: The name of the device
The password that was used to register this machine
The device token to use when retrieving a user token
member.returns: true, if the device token was issed successfully; otherwise, false.
